<p>99b.6</p>ji bzhin du/ /nyon mongs byang chub yan lag lam/ /de yang sangs rgyas thod pa las/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med pas/ /de bas 'dod la nan tan du/ /bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu gyis/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sems can thig ler gnas
<p>99b.7</p>pa'o/ /de yang saM pu Ta las kyang / /'di la bsal ba ci yang med/ /bsnan par bya ba cung zad med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/ /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rnams la bshad par 'tshal bar ston/ /gsang dbang nor bu'i yan lag na/ / 
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>rdo rje yis ni mi bskyod par/ /de skad e waM thabs shes rab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gyen gshegs pa'o/ /bde chen sems la gsol mdzad nas/ /thabs shes thal mo sbyar byas te/ /lus btud skar ma'i sbyor ba las/ /spyan sngar 'dug ni rtogs
<p>100a.2</p>pa'o/ /de ltar d+hU tI la brten nas/ /dga' ba bcu drug rnam dag pas/ /zhus pa'i tshig bcad bcu drug dag /zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //le'u gnyis pa slar gsungs pa/ /byis pa'i skye bo gdul slad du/ /ston pa la sogs mi 'ga' la/ /'dir ni chen
<p>100a.3</p>po'i don bshad pa/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /ces pas shAkya thub pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang che/ /a ra li las zas gtsang thabs/ /sgyu ma chen mo shes rab la/ /don grub rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /mchog tu dga' ba bde ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das ni phyag
<p>100a.4</p>rgya che/ /rdzogs pa gtsug tor thig le rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas 'khor drug dag ye shes/ /rkang gnyis mchog ni bden pa gnyis/ /yang na gtsug tor nor bu gnyis/ /nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba/ /zhes pa yi ni don bshad pa/ /'jig rten kun du khyab pa yi/ / 
<p>100a.5</p>ye shes skyes pas ye shes kyi/ /d+hU tI mthong rtags mthar thug pa/ /re khA nag po phra ba'i phra/ /longs sku 'phro ba mthong ba'o/ /de yang dang por sangs rgyas las/ /du ba smig rgyu srin bu me/ /zhes pa rtags bcu bstan pa'o/ /ring zhing rnam par rtog pa las/ /mtshan
<p>100a.6</p>rtags thob pas blo yangs pa/ /nyin mtshan rab tu brkyang mdzad de/ /de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las/ /gang tshe goms pa brtan gyur pa/ /gsal snang dngos su mthong bar 'gyur/ /lce rtser phyin pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid 'dod pa de srid du/ /lce 'phel bar ni 'gyur
<p>100a.7</p>ba yis/ /de tshe khams gsum po yang blta/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum po lus ngag yid/ /snang byed kyi ni rtsa gsum nyid/ /bdud bzhi phung nyon 'chi lha bu/ /dgra rnams bdud sogs nyon mongs rnams/ /'dul byed bde rlung thig le khams/ / 
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>ma thul sems can rnams kyi lam/ /'og bltas rtsa gsum ngan song gsum/ /zag pa rgyas pas 'khor bar 'khor/ /de nas mi 'dzag ye shes gsum/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i lhan cig skyes/ /'dzum bstan nas ni dga' ba bzhi/ /tshangs pa dbu ma'i lam yin te/ / 
<p>100b.2</p>gsung ni gyen rgyu'i lam yin te/ /snyan pa bde rlung sil sgra 'byung / /'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas/ /zhes pa bcu drug rtsa rgyas pas/ /sgo gsum lhan skyes khyab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje bsam gtan la/ /stobs po che ni lhan skyes bde/ /rim gyis byon pas
<p>100b.3</p>dga' bzhi rgyas/ /gsang dbang rdo rje nor bu la/ /slar gsungs pa ni mthar thug nas/ /slar yang gnas su gshegs pa'o/ /snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas/ /zhes pa thams cad bde chen khyab/ /rang snang bzhin du bzhin snang ba'o/ /'gro la rnam par rtag pa'i rlung / / 
<p>100b.4</p>phan pa'i don du 'gog par byed/ /yum lngas longs spyod ldan pa khyod/ /ye shes lus ni rdo rje'i lus/ /'jam dpal thig le'i khams yin te/ /ming brjod dga' ba skad cig ma/ /don chen rtog med bde ba che/ /dag par byed pa rtog spros bral/ /bcing grol thams cad de
<p>100b.5</p>bzhin nyid/ /sdig sel ba ni srog gcod sogs/ /rtsa ba bzhi dag gos pa med/ /ti lo pa yi zhal nas kyang / /ri rab gser gyi legs la gang gnas pa/ /gang gi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang / /de bzhin skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin
<p>100b.6</p>bor nas phyag rgya che/ /zhes gsungs so/ /da ni mchog mi 'gyur ye shes/ /nyan par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid do/ /legs so nyon mongs ye shes rtogs/ /lag na rdo rje sbyor grub la/ /khyod legs so ni bsgom pa'o/ /gsang ba to ga nor bu'i
<p>100b.7</p>gnas/ /bdag po lte bar bde ba 'dzin/ /lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong / /de phyir gsum pa'i dus su ni/ /nga yis khyod la rab tu bstan/ /khyod ni rtog med rtse gcig pas/ /yid kyis nyon la bsgom par gyis/ /bcom ldan b+ha ga btsun mo'i gnas/ /de ni skyon nub pas
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>legs zhes/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par spras/ /rang gi dbang bskur snying rje che/ /rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer la/ /spyod pa byed par rtogs par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gyen la gshegs
<p>101a.2</p>pa gsol ba'o/ /gtsug tor chen po la sogs pa'i/ /'khor lo drug rtsa'i rnam dag pas/ /slar gsungs sh+lo drug tu dag /slar gsungs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa le'u gnyis pa'o// //rigs drug la gzigs le'u ni/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /ces pas
<p>101a.3</p>bcom ldan bde ba la/ /shAkya stong pa chen po nyid/ /thub pa nor bu mi 'da' ba'o/ /gang gis gzigs na de yis gzigs/ /gang la gzigs na rigs drug la/ /ji ltar gzigs na 'khor lo drug /sangs rgyas drug tu gzigs pa'o/ /gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad ni/ / 
<p>101a.4</p>'khor lo drug lter khyab pa yis/ /'od gsal ba ni byang chub sems/ /nor bu'i kha nas mi 'pho ba/ /mi bskyod rdo rje lhan skyes dga'/ /badzri d+h+r-i ka ste 'jig pa med/ /gsang sngags lte rtsa yi ge'i gzugs/ /rig sngags dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'phro/ /'chang ba'i rigs ni pha yin
<p>101a.5</p>te/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo dzi na dzika /rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o/ /rigs gsum rdul mun snying stobs te/ /rnam par gzigs ni mtshan nyid med/ /dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'od dpag med pa A ro l-i ka /'jig rten lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ 'jig
<p>101a.6</p>rten 'das pa snying ga nyid/ /rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan la/ /mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rin 'byung nyid/ /rat+na d+h+r-i ka ste gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten zhu ba'i khu ba la/ /snang byed bde chen snang ba'o/ /rigs chen don grub ye shes sku/ /haM las 'bab pa'i phrin las byed/ /stong pas
<p>101a.7</p>brgyan pas pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje sems/ /rigs mchog rigs bsdus bde chen grol/ /thig le bcu drug yongs rdzogs pa/ /bco lnga'i mtha' can rnam par dag /de nyid gtsug tor chen po dang / /rin po che yang de nyid do/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba/ /de la
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>ston pas cher gzigs pa'o/ /gnas dang phung po dga' ba dang / /las dang lha dang ye shes dang / /drug ldan de la gzigs pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis/ /sh+loka gnyis dag pa'o/ /rigs drug la gzigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // 
<p>101b.2</p>de nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni/ /mngon par byang chub le'u la/ /tshig gi bdag po sangs rgyas kyis/ /tshigs su bcad pa sh+lo ka /rtsa yi dra ba ji snyed pa/ /bsdus pas 'khor lo drug tu bsdus/ /de nyid gsang sngags rgyal po drug /ldan zhing badzra d+h+r-i ka sna tshogs/ /'khor lo drug
<p>101b.3</p>la ldan pa'o/ /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang / /zhes pa kun rdzob don dam la/ /kun rdzob kun brtags gzhan dbang gnyis/ /don dam yongs su grub pa ste/ /med pa bden pa dbyer med la/ /'byung ba sku gsum 'byung ba'o/ /yang na mtha' bzhi bral ba yi/ /chos
<p>101b.4</p>kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /nang du gnyis ni ro rkyang gnyis/ /de ni rtag chad mtha' yin pas/ /med pa kun 'dar ma nyid do/ /ma skyes rang bzhin ro gcig par/ /'byung ba bde chen mchog mi 'gyur/ /de nyid mi skye chos can no/ /'di gsungs pa ni bsam brjod
<p>101b.5</p>med/ /a A i I u U e ai o au oM aH zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na/ ma ning bzhi ni ma bshad pa/ /skye med ston pa'i rgyud yin phyir/ /yi ge bcu gnyis bsten pa ni/ /sa bcu gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing
<p>101b.6</p>dang ni/ /tshan+do nye ba'i tshan+do dang / /'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba dang / /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod dang / /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /thung ngu drug ni dang po la/ /ring ba drug ni nye ba'o/ /'khor lo drug la 'jug pa dang / /gnas pa longs spyod thim pa dang / /bzhi
<p>101b.7</p>bzhis rlung 'gags mchog thob bo/ /'o na thob lam sa de gang / /zhe na a sogs bcu gnyis ni/ /kun du 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /nam mkha' 'od dang rdo rje 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /me tog 'od dang dpe med 'od/ /bla ma'i 'od dang shes rab 'od/ /kun
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>mkhyen dang ni so sor rig /dang po'i thung gsum sgo gsum dga'/ /dang po ring gsum mchog tu dga'/ /gnyis pa thung gsum dag 'bral ba/ /ring gsum lhan cig skyes dga'o/ /dga' bzhi'i rang bzhin pha rol phyin/ /ma skyes pa yi don bshad
<p>102a.2</p>pa'o/ /de la skye ba'i rnam 'phrul ni/ /s+thi to hr-i di thig le la/ /dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti bde chen te/ /ra haM bud+d+to sbangs rtogs ldan/ /bud+d+hA nAM ni d+hU tI'o/ /t+ya d+h+wa bar+t+ti nAM ni rlung gsum bsgom/ /oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na zhes pa ni/ /nor bu mi bskyod rlung gcod pa'o/ /duHkha srid pa ts+tshe da ni/ /lte ba'i nang gnas
<p>102a.3</p>rnam snang mdzad/ /pradz+nyA shes rab 'od dpag med/ /dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye snying ga /dz+nyA na kA ya don grub ste/ /dpral bar gnas pa thig le'i khams/ /wA gI shwa ra rin chen 'byung / /mgrin par chos kyi phung po gnas/ /a ra pa tsa na rdor sems/ /gtsug tor gnas pa bcom ldan
<p>102a.4</p>'das/ /ya te na maHde phyag 'tshal/ /yang na a ra pa tsa na/ /zhes pa'i yi ge don bshad na/ /mi 'gyur ye shes rtogs pa yis/ /'dod chags la sogs sman chen bsten/ /mi 'chi lnga spyad dngos grub thob/ /gsang spyod rigs spyod kun du bzang / /rnal 'byor rig
<p>102a.5</p>pas dpyad par bya/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti'i gsung ngag yin/ /de ltar tshigs bcad gsum po des/ /lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa'o/ /sngags kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //le'u lnga pa rdo rje dbyings/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa ni/ /phung khams
<p>102a.6</p>dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /'di ltar phyag rgya chen po la/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ling+ga/ /rtag tu rgyas bde kun du bzang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor rgyas pa'o/ /a las 'byung ni shes rab phyin/ /'od gsal phyag rgya chen mo la/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba
<p>102a.7</p>ma mA kI/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /ma ning rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin/ /rlung 'gog bzlas pa mchog sgrol ma/ /don chen yi ge yon tan la/ /dam pa thams cad ster bar byed/ /khong nas 'byung ba gtum mo'i me/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /lte bar gtum mo sbar ba
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan sogs yang ni bsregs byas nas/ /haM las ri bong can 'dzag go/ /zhes gsungs so/ /srog chen rdzogs byed gos dkar mo/ /tshig tu brjod pa nyams pa'i mtha'/ /spangs pa bde chen brtan spyan ma/ /brjod pa kun
<p>102b.2</p>gyi rgyu yi mchog /bde stong dbyer med ye shes so/ /tshig kun rtsa rlung yi ge'i gzugs/ /gtum mos klag pas bde stong gsal/ /de nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /nyams su myong ba mchod pa ste/ /phyi rol rdzas rnams rgya chen phul/ /dam pa gsum gyis bsngo byas nas/ /'di
<p>102b.3</p>phyi'i yon tan rjes 'brangs pas/ /thar pa'i rgyur gyur shin tu dka'/ /thar pa'i ci smos khams gong ma'i/ /rgyur gyur pa yang ting 'dzin dang / /de byed rnam par g.yengs phyir ro/ /de nas mchod chen ma yin no/ /bdud rtsi bsten sogs 'dod yon spyad/ /de yang rgyud
<p>102b.4</p>pa'i rgyu min pas/ /mchod chen ma yin mchod chen ni/ /dug lnga'i de nyid rtogs pa de'i/ /gsum pa'i ye shes gcig pu yin/ /chen po'i shes rab ye shes so/ /'dod chags gsum dus ye shes che/ /sems can las can skal bzang la/ /sgo gsum dpag med
<p>102b.5</p>dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po gong bzhin la/ /zhe sdang che ni rlung 'gog pa'o/ /des ni bde g.yos rtog med pas/ /spang bya nyon mongs kun gyi sgra/ /che ba 'di la mi bskyod pa'o/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /srog rtsol d+hU tI'i lam zhugs pas/ /gti mug blo ni
<p>102b.6</p>shes rab la/ /gti mug sel ba snang mdzad pa'o/ /mchod pa chen po gong dang mtshungs/ /khro ba chen po nyams pa 'joms/ /yang na dga' bral ye shes la/ /khro ba chen po lhan cig skyes/ /drag po chen po don grub po/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod pa che/ /bde bas
<p>102b.7</p>sems bsdus mi rtog rgyas/ /de yis 'dod pa thams cad nyid/ /sel bar byed phyir rin po che/ /chags pa nyid na chags pa med/ /'dod sogs lnga po dbyer med pa/ /drug pa rdor 'chang dus 'khor lo/ /'dod pa chen po lus bde ba/ /bde ba chen po gang bde ba/ /dga'
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>ba chen po sems bde ba/ /mgu ba che ni ye shes bde/ /de yang ma log gnyid song dang / /rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang / /de nyid sbrul longs spyod bde chen/ /dga' ba dga' bzhir nyams su myong / /gzungs che thig les ling+ga rgyas/ /lus kyang
<p>103a.2</p>'od gsal che ba ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku yul rgyas pa'o/ /de ni lus kyi dga' ba mchog /kha dog che zhing yon tan rgyas/ /lus po che ba d+hU tI rgyas/ /de ni ngag gi mchog dga'o/ /ming yang che zhing mchog gsang theg /rgya che des khyab bde sems dga'/ /dkyil ni bde
<p>103a.3</p>ba snying po la/ /'khor ni rtsa thig rlung gis bskor/ /chen po'i chos nyid yangs pa yin/ /sgyu ma lta bur shar ba'o/ /de ni ye shes mchog dga'o/ /de ni longs sku'i dga' bzhi'o/ /shes rab mtshon chen stong pa nyid/ /'chang ba dngos rnams 'joms pa ste/ /nyon
<p>103a.4</p>mongs chen po las brgya yi/ /pad+ma la brten skyes pa yi/ /bde myong lus kyi dga' bral dga'/ /lcags kyu'i mchog ni ye shes kyi/ /'dod pas 'khrig chags bzhi bde ba/ /de ni ngag gi dga' bral dga'/ /grags chen me rlung sgra yin la/ /snyan grags gsal snang ye shes te/ / 
<p>103a.5</p>sems kyi dga' bral dga' ba'o/ /snang ba chen po rdo rje thabs/ /gsal ba chen po shes rab yum/ /gnyis med sbyor bas bde rgyas pa/ /ye shes dga' bral dga' ba'o/ /mkhas pa bde stong thabs la mkhas/ /sgyu 'phrul snang stong chen po 'chang / /de ni lus kyi lhan skyes
<p>103a.6</p>dga'/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya bzhi/ /'grub pa med pas don grub pa'o/ /ngag gi lhan cig skyes dga'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po b+ha ga la/ /dga' bas dga' ni bde myong ba'o/ /de ni sems kyi lhan skyes dga' ba'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po rtsa 'khor lo/ /mig 'phrul can
<p>103a.7</p>ni zhen pa'o/ /de ni ye shes lhan skyes dga'/ /gtsug tor rdo rje nor bu'i bar/ /dga' gsum dga' ba bcu gnyis las/ /mas yar dga' ba dga' bzhi ste/ /gnyis mnyam gnyis gnas dbus dag na/ /bde dang mi rtog mtshan dang bral/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i yul can
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>la/ /dga' bral rtog zhes brjod du gsungs/ /dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug go/ /rgyas par bshad pa dri med ltos/ /sbyin bdag chen po phyi nang gtong / /gtso bo sgeg mos lhan skyes ster/ /'jig rten sbyin las khyad par 'phags/ /tshul khrims chen po byang chub sems/ /'chang
<p>103b.2</p>ba mi mnyam nor bu yi/ /rtse mor phreng ba ma nyams mchog /bzod chen bde bas sems bsdus blus/ /'chang ba mi 'phro brtan pa'o/ /brtson 'grus chen po g.yas g.yon rlung / /d+hU tIr brtul ba 'phar g.yo gar/ /bsam gtan chen po bde stong la/ /ting 'dzin me tog rtse gcig blta/ / 
<p>103b.3</p>shes rab chen po stong pa nyid/ /lus ni ma rig mun pa'i dngos/ /'chang ba gnyen po'i mar me 'dzin/ /stobs po che ni rlung grub pa/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdug spos can/ /thabs che bas ni bde 'phel bas/ /lus rnams kun la khyab par byug /smon lam khu ba mnyam za bas/ / 
<p>103b.4</p>chos rnams dpe brgyad sa spyod ma/ /ye shes me rlung rgya mtsho ni/ /bin+du dung khang gnas pa ste/ /mkha' spyod rnam par dag pa'o/ /byams chen shes bya bde bar shar/ /rang bzhin spros bral dpag med rtogs/ /snying rje chen po chags bcas la/ /blo yi mchog ni bde stong myong / /shes
<p>103b.5</p>rab chen po gang du yang / /dmigs su med pa phyag rgya che/ /blo chen ldan ni dga' bzhi'o/ /mkhas pa chen po zhes pa ni/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /sems dpa' reg pa chags pa rgyas/ /shin tu chags chen 'dar ba dang / /g.yo dang 'khrug dang yid 'khrug dang / /myos
<p>103b.6</p>dang brgyal ba bcu ru 'dod/ /de nyid nang du sbyar ba yis/ /so so bsdu ba'i mtshan ma bcu/ /thabs chen yul ni nyi shu bzhir/ /bde bas khyab pa dpa' bo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan/ /zhes pa rlung rnams 'chun pa'o/ /shugs chen byang sems mi nyams pa/ / 
<p>103b.7</p>mgyogs pa chen po rtsa kun khyab/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /bde bas bdag gzhan bskul nus pa'o/ /stobs chen mtshams med lnga sogs las/ /pha rol gnod pa des mi gos/ /de yang rdo rje theg pa las/ /gdol pa smyig ma
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>mkhan la sogs/ /mtshams med lnga sogs byed pa'i mi/ /gsod pa don du gnyer bas kyang / /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /zhes pa'o/ /srid pa'i ri bo 'jig tshogs kyi/ /lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis so/ /chen po gzhig par dka' ba'o/ /'joms ni bde
<p>104a.2</p>chen spros bral lo/ /bde chen thob rtags gang zhe na/ /mkhregs shing nor bu'i rtsa gnas la/ /rdo rje chen po ling+ga rgyas/ /'chang ba rdo rje 'jigs byed do/ /de nyid drag po chen po ste/ /drag shul chen po dug gsum 'joms/ /'jigs chen rtag pa 'jigs par byed/ /'jigs par
<p>104a.3</p>byed pa chad pa 'joms/ /mgon po rigs mchog phyag rgya che/ /chen po de las lhag med pa'o/ /bla ma bde ba chen po la/ /gsang sngags bde ba'i dam tshig bsrung / /che ba'i mchog ni thabs mchog go/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /zhes pa thabs 'dis 'jig rten 'di/ /'dir
<p>104a.4</p>'degs pas na tshul la gnas/ /de nas theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul ni he ru bdag med ma/ /mchog ni rdo rje pad+mar sbyor/ /gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying / /lte ba gsang ba nor bu rtse/ /'gro dang byon pa bcu bzhi yis/ /tshigs bcad bcu bzhi rnam par dag /rdo rje'i lus nyid rdo
<p>104a.5</p>rje dbyings/ /gnas bdun byon gshegs bde myong ba/ /lha'o des na dkyil 'khor te/ /brgyad brgya bcu gnyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //le'u drug pa chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni/ /sangs rgyas
<p>104a.6</p>bde chen gsol bar mdzad/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od gsal che/ /thub pa chen po mi nyams bde/ /thub chen ldan pa sgo gsum brgyas/ /gsang sngags tshul chen bde stong la/ /de las byung ba 'dod yon lam/ /gsang sngags tshul chen dbang bzhi la/ /rig pa bzhi yi bdag nyid
<p>104a.7</p>can/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ /ces pa bum dbang rdzas bcu ster/ /gsum la rdzas gsum ster sbyin pa/ /gnyis sbyor byang sems brtan 'dzin pa/ /tshul khrims rtog bral bzod pa'o/ /brtson 'grus ba thag tsam mi 'jig /bde stong mi g.yo bsam gtan no/ /shes
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>rab lha mo'i phyag rgya las/ /bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa'o/ /thabs ni gong gis ma rtogs na/ /ka ra na bcu la brten nas/ /'gog dang zlog dang khyab sogs thabs/ /de yang sdom pa rgya mtsho las/ /kun du tsumA ba kuN+Da li/ /na khas rtse dang nA das rtse/ /yang dag sbyor dang sid ces smra/ / 
<p>104b.2</p>nyed cing skyes pa ltar byed pa/ /brgyad la brgyad brgyad dbye ba yis/ /byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /smon lam bde chen mi 'bral ba/ /stobs ni bzlog dka' zlog pa'o/ /ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /phyin bcu thob pas dbang rdzogs pa'o/ /de yang
<p>104b.3</p>kam+ba'i zhal snga nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dgon par rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /gser snod dag tu seng ge'i zho ldugs tshe na phan tshun du/ /dbul ba sel dang bsil ba thob pas dang po gnyis/ /rjes chags khro med le lo med pas gnyis pas gsum dang bzhi/ /rtse gcig rtog bral gsum
<p>104b.4</p>pas lnga pa drug pa de bzhin gzhan/ /'gog len khyab byed gnas pa 'khrul 'khor rlung thabs stobs/ /gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bcu gnyis smon 'debs de bzhin nyid/ /bde dang cig shos dbyer med gnas pa gzhi ni bzhi pa ste/ /bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdag la 'di 'dra gsal
<p>104b.5</p>bar snang / /zhes gsungs so/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /zhes pa khams bcu 'joms pa ste/ /rlung dang sems dang byang chub sems/ /khrag dang rkang dang rus pa dang / /rus pa sha dang dbang po dang / /pags pa la sogs bcu po de/ /bde bas khyab brtan gnas pa'o/ /de nyid
<p>104b.6</p>gnas dang dag par 'dod/ /pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/ /zhes pa yul dang yul can dag /pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/ /zhes pa ka ra na bcu yis/ /bde stong skyes pa tshul chen no/ /mgon po bde chen he ru ka /sa bcu gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /dbang phyug mi 'dzag dga' ye shes/ / 
<p>104b.7</p>sa bcu la ni gnas pa'o/ /zhes pa ka ra na bcu la/ /sbyin sogs re res brgyan pa'o/ /shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa lta stangs shes pa las/ /rnam dag thob rtags rnam pa bcu/ /du ba smig rgyu srin bu me/ /'bar ba zla sngon mkha' dag dang / /thig le re khA nag po'o/ / 
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>bdag nyid can ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /longs sku mthong ba yin par 'dod/ /shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po/ /zhes pa bug med nam mkha' dag /bltas te dbang po yul yul can/ /gcig tu gyur pa mthong ba ni/ /sbyor ba yan lag drug yin te/ /rtags rtogs ldan pa
<p>105a.2</p>'chang ba yin/ /dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /nam mkhar sems gtad mig mi 'dzums/ /rdo rje lam zhugs rtags bcu mthong / /zhes so/ /rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/ /zhes pa rnam bcu gong rtags la/ /sha la sogs pa spyan lnga yis/ /yul dang yul can mthong
<p>105a.3</p>ba'o/ /thub dbang stobs bcu zhes pa ni/ /gyen thur med khyab srog dang ni/ /klu dang rus rtsangs nor lha sbyin/ /khyab pa'i bdag nyid bde stong ngo / /kun gyi nyi khri chig stong la/ /don ni 'gog cing ma lus byed/ /rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /me dang zla ba nyi ma dang / /thig le nag po thig
<p>105a.4</p>le che/ /sangs rgyas longs sku mthong ba'o/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /tshe las yo byad skye dang chos/ /rdzu 'phrul mos smon sems ye shes/ /rtags bcu'i grub pa dbang bcu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /thog ma med pa dga' ba la/ /spros med bdag ni mchog dga'o/ / 
<p>105a.5</p>de bzhin nyid ni lhan cig skyes/ /dag pa'i bdag ni dga' bral lo/ /bden par rang bzhin myong bzhin pa/ /smra zhing rigs ldan bu la ni/ /tshig mi 'gyur ni don dang rtags/ /bde ba che la sbyor ba'o/ /shes rab bu ni bla ma yis/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /ces pa 'dzag pa spong
<p>105a.6</p>ba'o/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/ /zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na/ /dang po rtog pa bsgom pa ste/ /de nas rtog med skye ba yin/ /zer ba mi 'thad rgyu 'dra las/ /'bras bu 'dra ba byung phyir ro/ /sA lu las ni khre min no/ /des na rtog med rgyu las ni/ /'bras bu rtog med ye
<p>105a.7</p>shes skye/ /yang dag ye shes mtha' nor bu/ /de la rnam par gnas pa ni/ /mi 'dzag ye shes dga' ba'i sems/ /bdag med chos rnams brjod du med/ /seng ge rim gnon sgra ldan pas/ /mu stegs de nyid mi shes pa/ /stong sgras ri [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]ngan 'jigs byed/ /kun du 'gro ba bde

<p>105b.1</p>chen po/ /don yod stobs ni sbyor bas brtson/ /ji ltar 'bab pa de bzhin du/ dung khang gnas su slar gshegs pa'i/ /bde chen khyab pa yid ltar mgyogs/ /rgyal ba 'dod chags las rgyal dga'/ /rnam rgyal rlung rgyal dga' ye shes/ /dgra las rgyal ba ma rig sogs/ /rten
<p>105b.2</p>'brel las rgyal lhan skyes so/ /'khor lo drug la sgyur ba ni/ /rtsa la thig les brgyan pa'o/ /stobs po che ni dpung bzhi ste/ /snang ba thob dang snang ba mched/ /brtan dang de kho na zhus bzhi'o/ /tshogs kyi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /slob dpon shu kra ye shes so/ /tshogs kyi dga'
<p>105b.3</p>gsum mchog ldan skyes/ /tshogs ni skad cig gsum yin te/ /rje ni mtshan med skad cig ma/ /tshogs ni phyag rgya gsum yin te/ /bdag po phyag rgya chen po'o/ /chos can bco brgyad de dag la/ /dbang dang ldan pas dbang ldan no/ /mthu chen bde chen gces pa la/ /rtag tu
<p>105b.4</p>nyams med 'dzin pa ste/ /de nyid tshul chen rtags bcu thob/ /gzhan dring mi 'jog bcos ma med/ /tshig rje dag gis mchog sbyin nus/ /tshig ni so sor yang dag rig /tshig bdag smra mkhas zhes pa ni/ /grub chen brgyad sogs phrin las rnams/ /tshig gi nus pas
<p>105b.5</p>nges tshig rig /tshig la dbang ba don rig pa'o/ /tshig mtha' yas pa shes rab rgyas/ /spobs pa so sor rig pa'o/ /tshig bden kun rdzob lha dkyil 'khor/ /bden par smra ba don dam ste/ /rdzogs rim rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las/ /thams

<p>105b.7</p>pa'i ni dga' bzhir ston/ /phyir mi ldog pa rlung grub pas/ /phyir mi 'ong ba thig le brtan/ /'dren pa rang gis rig gi rlung / /hUM has bde rlung 'dren pa'o/ /rang rgyal de yis khams rgyas pa/ /bse ru a wa d+hU tI yin/ /tshul ni mya ngan 'das pa'o/ /nges 'byung rdzogs pa'i sangs

<p>106a.1</p>rgyas so/ /sna tshogs theg pa sna tshogs lam/ /las byung ji ltar de ltar snang / /'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/ /zhes pa 'byung ba lnga yin la/ /chen po de las chos kun skyes/ /rgyu ni rgyu dang rkyen nyid do/ /gcig po chos dang chos can gyis/ /rgyu rkyen gyur pa

<p>106a.5</p>por 'dod/ /rdo rje gsum gyi byed pa la/ /'byung dang 'byung 'gyur chos rnams gnas/ /sku rdo rje la sra ba sa/ /gsher ba chu ste dro ba me/ /bskyod pa rlung ste go 'byed mkha'/ /gsung rdo rje yi rnam pa ni/ /A li shes rab ye shes khams/ /kA li thabs las khams lnga 'byung / /

<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>pa'i me tog ni/ /kha dog yi ge dug lngar smin/ /yi ge dang po'i sgra brtag pa/ /dbyangs dgra dbyangs la gsal byed dgra/ /gsal byed rang nyid yin par 'dod/ /gsal dbyangs thabs shes gnod pa med/ /dbyangs yig dgra gyur 'chi ba ste/ /gsal byed dgrar gyur
<p>106b.2</p>nad kyis thebs/ /yan lag dgrar gyur dpal 'phrog byed/ /dbang thang mi mthun rnyed pa med/ /de rnams mthun par gyur pas na/ /tshe ring nad med dpal 'byor ldan/ /phal pas btang snyoms 'bras gsal min/ /chu dgra rlung la rlung dgra sa/ /sa dgra me la me dgra chu/ /

<p>107a.1</p>yi dgra yis bya/ /tshe dang nad dang dpal dang grogs/ /srog lus dpal dang dbang thong la/ /de dang de yi gnyen pos byed/ /sa ni ser po sa gru bzhi/ /chu ni dkar po chu zlum po/ /me ni dmar po me gru gsum/ /rlung ni sngon po rlung zla gam/ /nam mkha'
<p>107a.2</p>kun grogs mdog dbyibs bral/ /de nyid gcig tu phan gnod dka'/ /'byung ba re la las drug ste/ /bsnun dang dbab dang sreg pa dang / /tshim dang gso dang dgyes pa'o/ /re re'ang thig les brgyan par bya/ /sgron ma'i ming la mtshon byas na/ /oM h+tAHphaT ni bsnun pa'o/ /

<p>107b.7</p>bsam pa grub pa ste zhes pa/ /las rgya sdug bsngal snod yin pas/ /spangs te ye shes phyag rgya las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mngon byed pa'o/ /kun du rtog pa mi mo la/ /brten pa'i bde ba thams cad spang / /rnam par mi rtog yan lag drug /phag mo bdag med ma

<p>108a.1</p>bsten te/ /dbyings mi zad pa'i ye shes thob/ /'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po/ /de yang gsungs pa/ /rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis/ /dngos po gang la gang rtog pa/ /de nyid kun du brtags pa yi/ /ngo bo nyid med de med do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'o na spang
<p>108a.2</p>bya kho na'am/ /zhe na chos dbyings dam pa la/ /zad mi shes pa'i thabs yod pas/ /blo ngan rnams la bstan pa yin/ /de yang klu las khros pa las/ /zhi bas phan par ma gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs nyid khro bor sprul/ /ji ltar ji ltar btul gyur pa/ /'di yi byed pa
<p>108a.3</p>rdo rje sems/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bsod nams snying rje chen po la/ /ldan pa chags pa'i blun pa'o/ /bsod nams mi 'dzag bde ba'i sems/ /tshogs ni phyag rgya chen po'i thabs/ /de yang / lus la ye shes chen por gnas/ /'di rtogs grol bar kun 'dod la/ /

<p>108a.5</p>sangs rgyas/ /'di 'dra'i bsod nams gang la srid/ /ye shes tshogs rnams de nyid do/ /des na rgyud rnams kun las kyang / /dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la/ /ci bde bar ni spyad pas 'grub/ /ces gsungs so/ /ye
<p>108a.6</p>shes nor bu dmigs med bde/ /ye shes haM skyes thig le'i khams/ /'byung gnas che ni de nyid do/ /de yang rgyud las 'di skad gsungs/ /rlung bcings pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg /rtog med ye shes la sbyor ba/ /lus kyi thabs la brten pa
<p>108a.7</p>mchog /ces gsungs so/ /rang la ye shes ldan pa yis/ /yod mi shes pa 'di yin te/ pha rol ye shes yod med shes/ /yang na mtha' bral rtogs pa'o/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o/ /zhes pa ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /sprul pa sprul te 'gro don nus/ /'di
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>'dra'i bde stong snying rje'i sems/ /med par dka' thub zas spong sogs/ /rgya mtsho rus sbal khog gshog 'dra/ /rtag pa mi nyams kun rgyal ba/ /rtsa stong phrag ni bdun cu gnyis/ /bde chen rang bzhin rgyas pa ste/ /rnal 'byor can ni sgo gsum dag /de yang lus las

<p>108b.3</p>gzhon nu sa ha dzAs/ /rig la smra bar ma nus pa'o/ /mchog gi dang po lhan cig skyes/ /sku gsum 'chang ba rdo rje sems/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa ma log log pa dang / /rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang / /sad pa gnas skabs lnga po ni/ /sangs rgyas
<p>108b.4</p>sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /khyab bdag lhan cig skyes pa la/ /ye shes lnga ni gnas skabs lnga/ /ye shes dag dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor nas/ /zhes pa 'di ru sbyor ba yin/ /sangs rgyas lnga bdag rigs lnga la/ /cod pan lnga phung dag rtags su/ / 
<p>108b.5</p>sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ba'o/ /spyan lnga mtshan mo'i rtags lnga la/ /bltas pas chags pa med pa 'chang / /de yang dra ba sdom pa las/ /dang po ri [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]srid du snang ba ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dud kha'i rnam pa can/ /gsum pa me khyer dang 'dra bzhi pa ni/ /sbyin med nam mkha'
<p>108b.6</p>mtshan ma lnga pa ni/ /shin tu 'od gsal rang gi snang ba 'char/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'o/ /zhes pa sprul longs sogs mthong la/ /nyin mo'i rtags mthong mngon shes drug /sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems/ /dam pa'i mchog ni bskyed pa'o/ / 
<p>108b.7</p>shes pa srid 'byung dkyil 'khor la/ /skye gnas med ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /de yang gsungs pa/ bskyed pa'i rim la rab gnas shing / /rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thabs dang ldan pa yis/ /skas kyi sen mo bzhin du bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /chos
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>las 'byung ba b+ha ga la/ /baM gzhag pa yi srid pa sel/ /gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /ces pa lhan skyes ye shes so/ /dngos de skyes ma thag tu ni/ /kun gyi don grub 'gro ba'i bdag /smin cing 'khrul 'khor ldan pa yis/ /nam mkha' las
<p>109a.2</p>byung rang byung ba/ /rtags brgyad mthong ba 'di lta ste/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /rang sems 'bar ba'i rnam pa can/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /'od chen rnam par snang ba'o/ /zla ba'i ye shes rnam snang mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i ye shes rin chen
<p>109a.3</p>'byung / /'gro ba'i ye shes mar me sgron/ /rA hu ye shes don yod grub/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /glog gi ye shes mtha' yas nyid/ /sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /thig le gnas pa'i ye shes te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid do/ / 
<p>109a.4</p>gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ /zla sngon snang ba'i ye shes ni/ /he ru ka dpal nyid du 'dod/ /gtsug tor chen po'i lta stangs kyis/ /re khA nag po ye shes mthong / /dus kyi 'khor lo thod pa can/ /rmad 'byung gtsug ni rdo rje 'chang / /thams cad mthong ba mchog
<p>109a.5</p>thob pa'o/ /nam mkha'i bdag po ta ra na/ /sna tshogs ston pa yon tan no/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /ta ra na bcings yon tan gyis/ /srid pa gsum po ma g.yos pas/ /nam mkha'i bdag por de gyur te/ /rtags bcu la sogs sna tshogs ston/ /zhes
<p>109a.6</p>gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ni/ /rtags rnams snang bas dngos po mchog /de 'dra mthong ba'i rnal 'byor te/ /kun dga' chen po mig dang ldan/ /ldan chos lta stangs bzhi yin te/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rtags mtshan rnams/ /byed pa po ni yan lag
<p>109a.7</p>drug/ /mchod cing brjod pa bsnyen sgrub bzhi/ /drang srong chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs gsum gnas dang zhing ye shes/ /'chang ba de la bde ba yod/ /gsang sngags 'chang ni rnal 'byor pa/ /thig le mi nyams gsang sngags 'dzin/ /dam tshig chen po rtag tu bde/ / 
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>gtso bo rtsa gsum dkon mchog gsum/ /'dzin pa de nang thig le 'dzin/ /theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/ /zhes pa lhan skyes ye shes rten/ /skal ba dang ni khyogs gdugs so/ /don yod thig le zhags pa ni/ /rlung gis 'bigs pas rnam par rgyal/ /'dzin pa 'khor
<p>109b.2</p>lo drug tu ni/ /rlung 'gog chen po rdo rje zhags/ /rlung gis de blangs rdo rje yi/ /lcags kyu zhags pa che zhes bya/ /yang na zhags pa che zhes pa/ /lte ba'i 'og rtsa 'khyil ba ni/ /nor rgyas ming can rlung de yis/ /d+hU tI nas 'phags byang sems 'gugs/ /de la zhags pa zhes
<p>109b.3</p>brjod do/ /lus ni yul chen nyi shu bzhi/ /dpral ba la sogs sbyar ba dang / /snying dbus pad+ma'i 'dab mar ldan/ /gnas gtso yin te rtsa lnga yi/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga dag /rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // 
<p>109b.4</p>le'u bdun pa rdo rje'i rigs tshigs su bcad pa bcu dang gcig /dang po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni/ /rdo rje a wa d+hU tI la/ /de nang rlung ni 'jigs byed do/ /'jigs par byed ni de rtog bshigs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dga' bral mtha'/ /so sor sdud sogs gdong drug la/ /'jigs
<p>109b.5</p>pa des ni rtog pa gcod/ /mig drug mngon shes lag drug rtags/ /stobs dang ldan ni 'dod chags kyis/ /chags pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /keng rus spyi bo'i haM dkar po/ /mche ba a shad gtsigs pa'o/ /bla ma'i gdams pas gtum mo sbyor/ /ha la ha la mkha'
<p>109b.6</p>ye shes/ /gdong brgya rtsa rlung stong pa yis/ /ye shes mi 'dra gdong brgya'o/ /gshin rje gnyis med ye shes te/ /gshed po de yis gnyis snang 'joms/ /bgegs kyi rgyal ni bdud bzhi rgyal/ /rdo rje yang dag ye shes la/ /shugs chen zhes pas 'jigs par byed/ / 
<p>109b.7</p>rdo rje drag po lus ngag yid/ /gsang ba 'dus sogs las gsungs so/ /rdo rje snying po chos kyi tshul/ /sgyu 'phrul mA yA e dang waM/ /rdo rje ling+ga gsus po che/ /rgyas shing shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje las skyes rdor bum nang / /dzA lan+d+ha ra dbu rgyan par/ /bde bas gang la rdo rje'i
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>bdag/ /rdo rje snying pos sku gsung thugs/ /mkha' 'dra gsang gnas las skyes bde/ /mi g.yo srog rtsol gnas pa la/ /ral pa gcig pa ro gcig grol/ /bsgyings pa de 'dra gang yod pa'o/ /glang chen bde ba ko rlon no/ /lus kun khyab cing mnyes par byas/ / 
<p>110a.2</p>de ldan pas na gos su gyon/ /grags chen bde bas gang ba la/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs dpa' bo'i gang / /hi hi zhes sgrogs dpa' mo'i gad/ /'jigs par byed pa mngon bde myong / /gad mo chen po bde chen thig /gad rgyangs can ni ltung ba'i sgra/ /ha brgyad brjod pa rdo rje'i gad/ /cher sgrogs
<p>110a.3</p>pa ni rgyun chad med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems/ /sems dpa' chen po dbyer med bde/ /rdo rje la rgyal po ni/ /de yi nang nas bde ba che/ /rdo rje drag po stong pa nyid/ /rtag tu de ldan dga' ba che/ /rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs/ /zhes pa hUM bzhis gnas bzhir ni/ /dga'
<p>110a.4</p>bzhi nyams su myong ba'o/ /rdo rje a wa d+hU tI la/ /mda' thogs pa ni mtshon cha can/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung 'gags pa/ /mtshon chen de yis rnam rtog gcod/ /rdo rje gnyis med ye shes kyi/ /ral gris nyon mongs ma lus gcod/ /rdo rje rlung rnams kun 'chang
<p>110a.5</p>ba/ /sna yi rtse mor yungs 'bru bsgom/ /de nyid nor bu rdo rje can/ /de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /sna rtser yungs kar zhes brjod pa/ /de yang srog dang rtsol bar brjod/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus la/ /srid gsum gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ / 
<p>110a.6</p>rdo rje gcig pu las rgya la/ /de bsten bde bas g.yul sel ba'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba tsaN+Da lI/ /mig mi bzang ni ri [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]mig /spyi bor rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /zhes pa yar rtse mar rtse 'bar/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa bcu drug la/ /de yi phyed phyed 'bebs pa che/ /khams gsum phyag rgya
<p>110a.7</p>chen por dbang / /mig brgya pa ste mang la bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni sha yi spyan/ /de yis gzugs brnyan mthong ba'o/ /lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can/ /zhes pa ba spu bye phyed bzhi/ /nang du thig le'i kha 'bu'o/ /de nyid rdo rje'i spu yin te/ /gcig pu lus ni rgyun chad med/ /sen mo dkar dmar
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>'dres pa las/ /skyes pa bde stong rdo rje'i rtse/ /mi 'dzag rtag tu dga' ba'i yid/ /rdo rje snying po rnam rtog med/ /pags pa mkhregs ni skyon mi tshugs/ /rdo rje phreng 'dzin yul rtsa bzhir/ /thim dang longs spyod 'jug pa gsum/ /nyin mtshan dus 'das dpal dang ldan/ /de 'dra'i
<p>110b.2</p>byed gsum rdo rje rgyan/ /rnal 'byor lus la brgyan pa ste/ /kun la bde ba'i gad rgyangs ni/ /dga' chen ha ha nges par sgrogs/ /yi ge drug pa 'khor lo drug /rdo rje'i sgra ni a k+Sha ra'o/ /'gyur pa med pa'i yi ge'o/ /'jam dbyangs thig le chen po la/ /de ni mi 'phro sgra che
<p>110b.3</p>ba/ /'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa/ /zhes pa zag pa dgra gcig pu/ /de 'dul thabs chen stong gsum gyi/ /nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /sgra dang ldan pa theg chen chos/ /sna tshogs thabs lam bstan pa las/ /rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di nyid do/ / 
<p>110b.4</p>snying ga'i phyi yi rtsa bdun dang / /'og gi rtsa bzhi dri chen dang / /dri chu khrag dang khu ba 'bab/ /bcu gcig dag pa sh+lo ka /bcu dang tshig rkang gcig dag pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //le'u brgyad pa 'od dpag med/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi le'u
<p>110b.5</p>la/ /tshigs brgyad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan/ /de bzhin nyid ni d+hU tI'o/ /yang dag bdag med g.yas g.yon rlung / /yang dag mtha' ste rlung grub pa/ /yi ge med ni rnam rtog med/ /stong gnyis mi 'dzag gang ba'i sems/ /smra ba
<p>110b.6</p>A li kA li la/ /khyu mchog bdud rnams 'joms pa ste/ /zab cing stong nyid rgya chen snang / /dbyer med dbyer med sgra sgrogs pa/ /chos kyi dung ste chos 'byung na/ /rtsa ni bde skyed dung can ma/ /bde ba dpag med sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi gaN+Di mgrin par gnas/ /brgyad
<p>110b.7</p>khri bzhi stong chos stong po/ /sgra bo che ni gsung rdo rje/ /mi gnas phyag rgya chen po la/ /mya ngan 'das pa chos sku'o/ /phyogs bcu yul dang yul can te/ /chos kyi rnga chen rtsa rlung phub/ /gzugs med chos sku stong pa nyid/ /gzugs bzang longs sku bde ba che/ /dam pa ste
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>ni rdo rje'i sku/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sprul sku'o/ /yid ni bde chen spros bral las/ /skyes pa sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /gzugs rnams rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba la/ /thams cad rten dang brten bcas la/ /brten nas sku bzhi'i snang ba'i dpal/ / 
<p>111a.2</p>gzugs brnyan nyin mtshan rtags bcu bzhi/ /ma lus 'chang ba thob pa'o/ /mtshungs pa med ni 'dod yon lngas/ /mi gnod 'phel zhing cher grags pa/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs mthar phyin/ /lam dang 'bras bu gnyis
<p>111a.3</p>yin no/ /'phags pa nyams pa med pa'o/ /lam ni 'khor lo drug yin no/ /shin tu mtho ba gtsug tor la/ /thig le mi nyams gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi rtog ni rdo rje rtser/ /rgyas pa po ni bde bas gang / /'jig rten gsum ni lus ngag yid/ /gzhon lus gcig
<p>111a.4</p>ni gsum pa'i dus/ /gnas brtan sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /rgan po lhan skyes ye shes so/ /skye dgu'i bdag ni bug dgu bsdams/ /de yang sgyu ma chen mo las/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis/ /de bzhin sna dang kha dag dang / /yid kyi snying po dgag pa ni/ /

<p>111a.6</p>mdzes/ /'jig rten mig la sogs pa la/ /shes legs skyon gyis ma gos par/ /ston pa slob dpon zhes brjod do/ /'jig rten 'byung ba lnga ldan k+Sha/ /slob dpon bzhi pa ster ba ste/ /de la 'jigs pa med pa mchog /gnyis med sbyor ba mgon skyob pa/ /'jig rten
<p>111a.7</p>yid gcugs don dam dang / /kun rdzob phan tshun mi 'gal ba'o/ skyabs dang 'bab pa skyob pa ni/ /bzlog pas ye shes bla na med/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ni shes rab la/ /longs spyod pa ni gnyis med spyor/ /thams cad mkhyen pa sbyor drug gis/ /rtags ma lus pa thob pa
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>las/ /ye shes mtsho ni zad mi shes/ /yon tan chen pos gang ba'o/ /ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis la/ /sgo nga'i sbubs ni mi shes gtums/ /'byed pa gsum pa'i ye shes so/ /yang na lus la sangs rgyas ni/ /yod pa ma rtogs sgo nga'i sbubs/ /'byed pa bla mas
<p>111b.2</p>ye shes sbyor/ /'di de lam mchog yin par gsungs/ /srid pa'i dra ba mi shes bsgribs/ /'joms pa po ni rtogs pa'o/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba nye nyon mongs/ /ma lus bzhi byed dga' ba bzhi/ /dbang bzhi las rnyed ye shes bzhi'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgya ste/ / 
<p>111b.3</p>pha rol phyin pa ye shes rgya/ /rgya gram gnyis med bde chen po/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur gang rnyed pa/ /de ni ye shes dbang bskur te/ /cod pan can ni gtsug tor smin/ /rdzogs pa rdo rje nor bu rtse/ /sangs rgyas bde chen nyams pa med/ /rgyan du thogs ni bde chen du/ /ye shes

<p>111b.5</p>mo/ /sgrib pa sa chu me rlung mkha'/ /rags phra rab phra don spyi dang / /sems dpa' dang ni bcu pa'o/ /kun las nges par grol ba ni/ /du ba la sogs bcu thob pa'o/ /de dus tsam na nam mkha' ltar/ /lhan skyes mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /nyon mongs dri ma gong
<p>111b.6</p>gi bcu/ /kun las 'das pa mthar phyin pa'o/ /de yi dus na lhan skyes dor/ /dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen por 'dod/ /sems can kun gyi spang bya la/ /klu chen po ni gnyen po ste/ /dga' bzhi reg dug la sogs pa/ /'dod sogs

<p>112a.1</p>bsregs pa'i thal phung bzhin/ /mkha' ltar mtha' med bder gnas pa/ /de nyid yid bzhin nor bu che/ /mi 'bral bden pa 'chang ba'o/ /rin chen zag med bde ba ste/ /kun mchog phyag rgya chen po la/ /khyab pa'i bdag ni brtan g.yo la'o/ /dpag
<p>112a.2</p>bsam shing chen d+hU tI la/ /rgyas pa rtsa rnams kun du ni/ /rlung dang thig les khyab pa'o/ /bum pa bzang po nor bu la/ /che ba'i mchog ni mi 'dzag bde/ /de yi byed pa ci zhe na/ /sems can gdul bya la dgongs nas/ /kun don byed pa bde 'phel ba'o/ /phan 'dogs yon

<p>112a.6</p>lo ltar rgyug pa'i/ /rab tu rgyug cing 'pho ba'i sems/ /rnam rtog yul la 'dzag pa'i sems/ /bde bar gzung bar the tshom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /sems can dbang shes rab 'bring bzhis/ /dus shes de la dbang bzhi ster/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas
<p>112a.7</p>shes/ /rnam grol gsum dam las ye shes/ /mkhas pa po ni sa 'og sogs/ /dbang thob nas ni yon tan gyis/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rnams/ /ldan zhing de la ye shes ldan/ /yon tan ye shes de la brjod/ /chos shes bkra shis 'jig rten bde/ /rab bkra

<p>112b.5</p>rigs lnga dag dang ldan pa'o/ /gnas skabs lnga po me tog thogs/ /zhes pa gnas skabs lnga po ni/ /ma log log dang rmi lam dang / /rmi lam che dang sad pa'o/ /me tog thogs pa rdzas 'dzin pa'o/ /mgo zlum kha khra mu kha la/ /brtul zhugs rnyed dang ma rnyed pa/ /bde ba
<p>112b.6</p>chen po 'dzin pa ni/ /tshangs par spyod pa mi nyams pa/ /brtul zhugs mchog kyang de nyid do/ /dka' thub nyan thos mthar thug pa/ /pha rol phyin pa dka' thub che/ /rdo rje'i theg pa nyid yin te/ /de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud las su/ /kha chu tsam zhig zags pa na/ /mkha' 'gro
<p>112b.7</p>ma mos rnal 'byor pa/ /bsgral te khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /dmyal ba zhes pa'ang de las 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /gtsang gnas dam pa skyon med pa/ /gauta ma rigs ma nyams/ /bram ze tshangs pa rig byed yin/ /snyan dngags srid srung nges brjod dang / /mchod sbyin bzhi
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>po tshangs pas shes/ /mya ngan 'das ni don dam pa/ /tshangs pa bral ba thob pa'o/ /grol ba stong pa thar pa ni/ /bde chen spros bral rnam grol lus/ /rnam grol phyag rgya chen po la/ /zhi ba zhi ba dga' bzhi nyid/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /ji ltar me
<p>113a.2</p>yis tshig pa la/ /me de nyid kyis bdugs te 'tsho/ /'dod chags me yis tshig pa la/ /'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol byed/ /ces so/ /mya ngan 'das pa chos kyi sku/ /mya ngan 'grel ni gzugs kyi sku/ /rnam par bshad pas de legs par/ /mya ngan 'das

<p>113a.4</p>yul yul kun las 'das pa'o/ /thub pa med pa spang bya la/ /rgyas par byas pa dpe med pa/ /mi mngon dga' ba 'gro bar min/ /mi snang mchog dga' chags par min/ /gsal byed min ni dga' bral la/ /mi 'gyur lhan cig skyes pa ste/ /kun 'gro khyab pa po de
<p>113a.5</p>nyid/ /phra zhing d+hU tI zag med nyams/ /sa bon rtog pa'i dri ma bral/ /rdul med chags pa'i rdul med cing / /rdul bral dngos po'i zhen pa spangs/ /dri ma med pa zhi ba'i dus/ /nyes pa spangs par rang bzhin rig /skyon med pa ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /shin tu
<p>113a.6</p>sad pa dbang dus su/ /go rtog skyes pa de yin la/ /legs par sad ni de nyid dang / /ma bral rtag tu ldan pa'o/ /kun shes gzugs sogs thams cad la/ /lhan skyes shes pa kun rig pa/ /dam pa po ni mchog mi 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa kun gzhir
<p>113a.7</p>gnas/ /de yang mdo las 'di skad du/ /thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te/ /de yod pas na 'gro kun dang / /mya ngan 'das pa 'byung ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdun po 'gags pa 'od gsal te/ /'od gsal rtog med
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>chos nyid 'das/ /'das pa gnyis med ye shes de/ /tshig gi yul min smra brjod bral/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul bral/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes/ /tshul 'chang ba ni bla ma yi/ /dus thabs bsten pas lhun grub tu/ / 
<p>113b.2</p>rnam par rtog med ye shes ni/ /gsum pa'i dus su nyams su myong / /'jig rten kun las 'das pa'o/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rtog pa'ang de/ /las byed pa ni de 'dra bas/ /rang gzhan gnyis ka smin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /ces pa de ni rtog pa'i
<p>113b.3</p>don/ /sangs rgyas rang gi ngo gang la/ /thog ma mkha' 'dra skye ba med/ /mkha' dang 'dra bas bar du yang / /gnas dus nyid nas mkha' dang 'dra/ /dper na gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/ /rgyu lam 'bras bu rnam dag pas/ /re dogs kun dang bral ba'o/ /de
<p>113b.4</p>ltar yin pa'i 'thad pa yang / /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /zhes pa dus gsum dag pa'o/ /de thabs gang las skyes she na/ /ye shes lhan cig skyes pa la/ /mig gcig d+hU tI nang yin te/ /dri med de ru rlung sems zhugs/ /ye shes lus can bde stong gang / / 
<p>113b.5</p>de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid/ /ma bsten rang lam byon gshegs byed/ /tshig gi dbang phyug rlung gnas pa/ /smra ba che ni gsung rdo rje/ /smra ba'i rlung la dbang phyug thig /smra pa'i rgyal po rtsar son pa/ /smra pa'i dam pa gsung rdo rje/ /mchog gi gsung ni gsung dag
<p>113b.6</p>pa'o/ /rlung grub smra ba'i seng ge nyid/ /nyon mongs rnam dag mtshungs pa med/ /kun du lta ba spang blang med/ /mchog tu dga' ba ye shes snang / /gzi brjid gsum mo ye shes la/ /phreng ba rgyud 'brel goms pa la/ /blta na sdug ni yon tan thob/ /'od bzang 'bar ba sa bon
<p>113b.7</p>te/ /dpal gyi be'u bkra shis mtshan/ /dga' ba 'khyil pa 'dzin pa ni/ /lag pas nyams su blangs pa las/ /'od 'bar snang ba bde ba po/ /dug chen po ni dngos po'i gnod/ /'dod chags la sogs gcod chen po/ /gtso mchog gi ni stong pa nyid/ /zug rngu rtog
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>bcas rlung gnyis po/ /'byin pa rlung bsgom bla na med/ /sman rnams ma lus gnyen po'i tshogs/ /ljon pa'i shing ni d+hU tI rgyas/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la/ /nad ni thog med des mnar ba'o/ /des na de nyid dgrar che ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum ni
<p>114a.2</p>sgo gsum ste/ /thig le dkar dmar 'dres pa ni/ /yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa/ /mdzes ni 'bar ba bsgom pa'o/ /dpal ldan bde chen khams yin te/ /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can zhes pa/ /rgyu ba rtsa la skar ma thig /lus kyi khams rnams bskor ba'o/ /de
<p>114a.3</p>yang rtsa thig du zhe na/ /gtsug tor bzhi pa dpral bcu drug /nyi shu bad kan mgrin so gnyis/ /snying gar brgyad de bzhi bcu'o/ /mkhris pa lte ba drug cu bzhi/ /gsang ba bcu drug brgyad cu po/ /rlung khams cha mnyam nor bu'i bar/ /bcu drug rigs drug nyi shu gnyis/ /rlung mkhris
<p>114a.4</p>bad kan 'dus pa'o/ /rtsa re'i nang na rlung bcu ste/ /rlung la brten pas thig le re/ /de ltar rtsa rlung thig le la/ /rkang grangs sum stong sum brgya dang / /drug cu tham pa yin par 'dod/ /de nyid dpa' bo dpa' mo ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /phyogs bcu lus kyi nying lag la/ / 
<p>114a.5</p>nam mkha'i mthar thug rlung lnga'i bar/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes khams/ /mi 'dzag bde ba legs par 'dzug /d+hU tI rgyas pa mchog yin no/ /'gro la rtsa rlung byang chub sems/ /gdugs bzhin bde chen 'khor lo la/ /yangs pa mi zad mdzod yin te/ /bde ba skyob phyir
<p>114a.6</p>gdugs zhes brjod/ /de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /e waM las ni 'byung ba dang / /thabs mang myur dang bde skyob dang / /'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyun du 'dod/ /ces gsungs so/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje yi/ /bde chen dkyil 'khor can
<p>114a.7</p>bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan rdo rje pad+ma ni/ /kak+kol zhes rab tu grags/ /gar gyi bdag ni sbyor thabs kyis/ /yan lag drug cu rtsa gnyis te/ /de yang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs yin/ /khyab bdag chen po thig le la/ /rin chen gdugs ni nor bu'i rtser/ /nyon mongs thams cad
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>bsil ba'o/ /gtum mo che las skyes pa yi/ /ye shes de la rab tu 'jug /de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi lam/ /mchog tu gyur pas rgyal po la/ /lam des sangs rgyas kun gyi sku/ /'bras bur 'chang ba 'di nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi lam 'bras la/ /sbyor bar byed pas
<p>114b.2</p>rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ni/ /bslab gsum yin la de 'di la/ /ldan pas lhan skyes bstan pa gcig /'di ni dang po'i dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje mtha' yas 'du shes dag /rin chen nyi ma tshor ba dag /dbang bskur dpal ni don yod grub/ /'du byed
<p>114b.3</p>rnam dag kun bdag ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs phung dag /dbang phyug ste ni mi bskyod pa/ /rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje brtul zhugs kun gyi bdag /de ltar sgrub pa'i dbang phyug thob/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rgyud gsum gyi/ / 
<p>114b.4</p>mchog gam kun gyi rje bo'o/ /de yang gnas rdzas dag dbang dang / /yon tan sgrub pa rnams sbyar ro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu che ba/ /zhes pa snod du gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur bas/ /skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /ces pa 'di yi don bshad na/ /bum pas
<p>114b.5</p>bskyed rim legs gnas khyod/ /khyod ni 'gro drug gang ma yin/ /de ni kun brtags yin zhe na/ /'di yang kun brtags des na lha/ /bla ma'i drin las rnyed pa yi/ /ci phyir rin chen ces spras min/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /rjes su 'dzin cing skyong ba'o/ /sangs
<p>114b.6</p>rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /dbang dang rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs/ /lus kyi phrin las slob dpon che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /zhes pas gsang ba'i dbang yin te/ /bla ma yab yum gnyis med las/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon sprul la/ /rdo rje nyi ma mtha'
<p>114b.7</p>yas la/ /de yi bde ba snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba mi bskyod pa/ /ye shes 'phro 'du dri med 'od/ /bu yi lce la sbyin par bya/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che/ /zhes pa gsum pa'i dbang yin te/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin rnams la/ /chags bral bla mas mtshon par bya/ / 
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>de ltar min na bla ma nyams/ /slob ma shin tu 'dod na yang / /so sor thar pa spang bar bya/ /lam 'di lam mchog thub chen gsungs/ /gang zag rnams la dge slong mchog /longs spyod gnas bsdams nam mkha' mthong / /kha dog gnyis
<p>115a.2</p>med lhan cig skyes/ /chags pa che ni bu de la/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las/ /rigs ldan lo ni bcu drug ma/ /lang tsho sogs kyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po legs par bslab bya ste/ /dpral ba la sogs gnas lnga dgod/ /sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya/ /zhes
<p>115a.3</p>gsungs pa'o/ /de yi cho ga yang gsungs pa/ /dang po gso sbyong sbyin par bya/ /de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin/ /de nas bye brag mdo sde bstan/ /de nas dbu ma'i tshul lugs sbyin/ /de rjes dus kyi 'khor lo sbyin/ /zhes gsungs pas/ ka ra na yi bstan

<p>115a.6</p>/sbom thung lus mkhrang shin tu sra/ /smra brtson spyan ma glang po ma/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pha yang lnga/ /seng ge ri dgas rta glang po/ /mi bskyod don grub rin 'byung dang / /'od dpag med dang snang mdzad do/ /dri ni sngon dang 'dra ba la/ /dben gnas 'jigs med yul dang bral/ /

<p>115b.1</p>'od dpag med pa'i rigs/\u0fad /shin tu rmongs bzang smra ba nyung / /rnag dri rnam par snang mdzad rigs/ /dri med 'od las de skad gsungs/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /shes rab de las byung ba dang / /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed la/ /sangs
<p>115b.2</p>rgyas yang dag brjod chos ni/ /bum pa'i sbyor ba yan lag lnga/ /'dus byas bsod nams tshogs kun gyi/ /rdo rje 'chang gi 'gran med gsungs/ /'dzin pa dbu ma me tog ldan/ /dpal ldan ye shes chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma las skyes pa'o/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bskur byas

<p>115b.4</p>brnyan mgal me gzugs brnyan dang / /'dus byas de ltar rtogs par bya/ /rtogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag go/ /zhes gsungs so/ /che ba bzhi pa'i ye shes la/ /gsum 'phags sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal/ /rdo rje rnon po bzhi pa de/ /ral gri che de rtog kun gcod/ /yi ge
<p>115b.5</p>mchog ste a yin la/ /rnam par dag pa 'gyur pa med/ /dbang bzhi de yi yon tan ni/ /theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ /de yang mi spong brten pas gcod/ /mtshon cha chen po de nyid la/ /rdo rje chos zhes grags pa yin/ /rdo rje zab mo skye med la/ /rgyal ba de rtogs 'jig rten

<p>115b.7</p>sa bcu la/ /rgyan rnams ldan ni dbang re zhing / /dang pos dbang po gnyis pas bzhi/ /gsum pas bzhi dang bzhi pas gcig /de yang gsang ba mdzod las gsungs/ /rab tu dga' ba chu yi dbang / /gsang ba dri med 'od 'phro byed/ /shes rab ye shes sbyang dka' ste/ /mngon
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>gyur mi g.yo ring song ba/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bas/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi dbyings/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rnam par dag pa'i lam de yis/ /bdag med chos nyid rdo rje 'chang / /yang dag ye shes bde chen po/ /zla 'od bzang po haM las

<p>116a.3</p>yon tan rlung grub dus/ /ye shes sku ni mtshan ma la/ /rnams ni dug sogs bco lnga la/ /ma lus 'chang ni re khA mthong / /blo gros bzang po rtog dpyod pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes can/ /kun du bzang po mnyam pa nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po lhun gyis grub/ /sa ni sa sogs

<p>116a.6</p>kun theg pa sna tshogs la/ /ngo bo nyid ni mthar thug pa/ /'chang ni bde stong dran pas skyong / /shes rab chen po stong pa nyid/ /skad cig tshe gcig 'jam dpal mthong / /chos dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/ /khong du chud pa ro gcig 'chang / /chos kun khams gsum rtog pa gsum/ / 
<p>116a.7</p>rdul mun snying stobs bde chen du/ /mngon par rtogs pa mchog yin te/ /thub pa mi 'dzag blo mchog ni/ /rnam grol bde stong 'byung po sel/ /mi g.yo rlung la de yis ni/ /rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid can/ /thig le bde bas brgyan pa la/ /spro dga' gnas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / 
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>de lta'i rang bzhin byang chub 'chang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mngon sum pa/ /gnyen po ye shes me lce can/ /d+hU tIr 'od 'bar gsal bas thob/ /gnas pa lus la 'khor lo drug /'byung ba phung po rnam pa lnga/ /yon tan drug
<p>116b.2</p>dang mtha' drug dang / /las kyi dbang phyug byed dbang drug /zhi gnas lhag mthong rnam pa gnyis/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag pa yis/ /tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //dgu pa rin
<p>116b.3</p>chen 'byung ldan ni/ /mnyam nyid ye shes le'u ston/ /'dod pa mchog gi ye shes la/ /don grub de ni bde bas thob/ /dam pa ste ni rtsol ba med/ /ngan song dgu ni dug gsum la/ /thams cad nyon mongs brgyad khri stong / /rnam par sbyong ba ma rig pa/ /lhan skyes ye
<p>116b.4</p>shes chen po rtogs/ /mgon po rdo rje theg pa 'di/ /sems can kun gyi lam mchog go/ /sems can thams cad ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya chen por rab sgrol byed/ /'khrul pa'i snang ba nyon mongs g.yul/ /stong nyid gcig pus 'joms pas dpa'/ /mi shes bden
<p>116b.5</p>'dzin 'du byed rnams/ /de nyid dgra ste dregs pa 'joms/ /'joms pas dpal ldan nyid yin la/ /blo ldan chos ldan chos de yis/ /sgeg pa 'chang ba ye shes ldan/ /brtan po gtsug tor thig le brtan/ /mi sdug stong pa shes rab la/ /gzugs 'chang ba ni bde stong

<p>116b.7</p>nyid bcu ming can/ /'di ni shes rab zhon pa'o/ /rtsa lam d+hU tIr 'jug pa ste/ /goms pa'i stabs kyis gar byed cing / /zhes pa sa ma he du sogs/ /skar ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /dpal ldan d+hU tIr lag pa gnyis/ /brgyas gang la ni rlung rtsa gang / /nam mkha' stong pa'i rang

<p>117a.1</p>bzhin la/ khyab par stong pa rlung dang ni/ /thig les brgyan pa gar byed pa'o/ /ya bo gcig gi khyon gyis ni/ /zhes pa ya bo ster rlung ste/ /khyon ni thams cad rdzogs par blang / /sa yi dkyil 'khor chos 'khor lo/ /mthil du gnon ni snying dbus na/ /chu shing
<p>117a.2</p>me tog lta bu yi/ /dpyid kyi thig ler thim pa'o/ /ming gzugs glang bo can zhes grags/ /tshangs pa yi ni sgo nga'i rtse/ /zhes pa tshangs sgo rtsa 'bras gnyis/ /rtse mo 'og rlung 'then pa ste/ khyon ni lus la rkang mtheb kyi/ /sen mo mnan pas gtum mo 'bar/ /dpyid kyi thig
<p>117a.3</p>le 'byung ba bzhin/ /kha ba ba mo lta bur 'dzag /de yi 'phel grib dkar nag phyogs/ /rim gyis bin+du 'phel ba yin/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nga gtsug tor rgyal/ /rtse nas rim gyis 'grib pa las/ /nag po g.yon pa'i ma rol 'bab/ /don gcig mi 'gyur byang chub sems/ /gnyis

<p>117a.7</p>ba las/ /don ni yul can mchog dga' nyid/ /ma lus yul dang yul can rnams/ /dga' ba gsum 'dus bcad thob pa/ /reg pa lhan skyes ye shes so/ /stong pa nyid dga' dga' bral ba/ /mchog gi ye shes dbu ma'i lam/ /yid la mi byed 'dod chags blo/ / 
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>'o na dngos por 'gyur zhe na/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs pa yi/ /dngos 'dzin byed pa spangs pa'o/ /srid gsum lus ngag yid gsum la/ /dga' ba chen po ye shes khyab/ /sprin dkar dag pa rdo rje sems/ /dkar po tshor bde gnyis su med/ /'od bzang bag chags spong
<p>117b.2</p>gnyen po/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /thig le bde chen mkha' la gnas/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /gtum mo ye shes me 'bar ba/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yum rnams bsregs/ /sen mo'i 'od ltar 'dres pa yi/ /byang sems mer 'dres
<p>117b.3</p>shas cher dmar/ /cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /gtsug tor gnas pa stod par byed/ /skra mchog mthon ka haM las ni/ /chen po can ni bin+du gnas/ /nor bu chen po bum par zhugs/ /'od chags dpal ni bde mi rtog /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /ces
<p>117b.4</p>pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /de yang rgyud las gsungs pa ni/ /mngal gyi khru ma chos gos te/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag /gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang haM/ /zla ba bcu gnyis khrims kyi gnas/ /pha dang
<p>117b.5</p>ma ni mkhan slob nyid/ /rang byung skyes pas dge slong nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus ma byas/ /sred pa'i chags pa rnam par dag /ces pa'o/ /'jig rten lus ngag yid gsum la/ /khams brgya kun spyod khyab pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyi nang rlung / /yongs su
<p>117b.6</p>rdzogs pa len par byed/ /stobs chen ldan ni bde chen rgyas/ /de nyid mi 'bral ldan pa ni/ /dran pa chen po 'chang ba'o/ /dran pa bzhi ni tsum+ba na/ /yul bzhi rjes su dran pa ste/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang / /bltas dang bgad pas tshim pa ni/ /rim
<p>117b.7</p>gyi dran bzhir dbang bzhi sbyar/ /mchog ni bltas pas tshim pa'o/ /byang chub yan lag ces pa ni/ /byang chub thig le 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /zas bad mkhris dang sha khrag dang / /rus pa klad pa bdun yan lag /me tog kun da spos gtum mo/ /de yang lan bdun bza' bar bya/ /zhes
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>pa mi nyams za ba'o/ /de bzhin chos kun gshegs pa'am/ /yon tan mtsho ni srid pa sel/ /lam ni a wa d+hU tI la/ /yan lag me rlung thig le'o/ /brgyad ni yas 'bab mas brtan pa'o/ /tshul rig bla ma'i ngag las so/ /yang dag rang byung ye shes
<p>118a.2</p>la/ /sangs rgyas lam ni zung 'jug pa/ /mthar thug lam du rig pa'o/ /des na sems can kun la ni/ /sgyu ma lta bur shas cher chags/ /chags pa 'khor ba yin zhe na/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med/ /chags pa med bzhin 'gro don du/ /sems can kun gyi
<p>118a.3</p>yid la ni/ /gang 'dul skye ba len cing 'jug /sems can kun gyi yid lta bur/ /brtson 'grus chen pos don byed mgyogs/ /sems can kun gyi dbang don ni/ /rab 'bring chen po mchog rnams shes/ /sems can kun gyi don byed tshul/ /yid 'phrog pa yi 'gro
<p>118a.4</p>don nus/ /phung po lnga po don dam pa/ /mya ngan 'das shing ma dmigs pas/ /de nyid shes ni ye shes lnga'o/ /rnam dag phung po lnga po ni/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang / /rnam grol rnam grol ye shes mthong / /'dzin pa mi 'dzag dga' ba'i sems/ /gang yod de la
<p>118a.5</p>phud lnga ldan/ /nges 'byung kun gyi byang chub gsum/ /mtha' la gnas ni rdo rje 'chang / /nges 'byung kun mtha' gong ma nyid/ /de la mkhas pa rdo rje theg /nges 'byung kun gyi lam la ni/ /ngo bor bde chen ye shes gnas/ /nges par 'byung ba rnam pa kun/ /bshad cing
<p>118a.6</p>spyod pa ston pa'o/ /yan lag bcu gnyis ma rig sogs/ /ma bkag srid rtsa 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /de ltar yin par byams pas gsungs/ /sgrib pa'i phyir dang 'debs phyir dang / /'khrid dang 'dzin pa'i phyir dang ni/ /rdzogs byed gsum 'dus gcod phyir dang / /nye bar spyod
<p>118a.7</p>dang sdud pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba byed dang mngon du byed/ /sdug bsngal phyir na 'og nyon mongs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur ye shes nyid/ /rtogs dang myong bas srid rtsa bton/ /de nyid dag pa nyid yin la/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang zhes pa/ /rten 'brel dag pas
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>gnas la sogs/ /bcu gnyis kun du spyod pa'o/ /bden bzhi lte snying mgrin dpral ba/ /tshul gyi rnam pa can zhes pa/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam 'gog pa/ /gnas brtan phal chen mang bkur smra/ /bden pa re res lam 'bras byed/ /shes pa brgyad po zhes pa ni/ /sna
<p>118b.2</p>tshogs rnam smin rnams med dang / /lha sngags ye shes dga' bzhi brgyad/ /rtog pa 'chang ni de dag pa'o/ /bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ni/ /byed dbang myong ba rnam par smin/ /'bras bzhi re re che 'bring gsum/ /ldan pa rdo rje'i sku yin no/ /de nyid thig le chen po la/ /dga' ba
<p>118b.3</p>rnam pa bcu drug rigs/ /rnam pa nyi shu phung lnga dang / /'byung lnga yab lnga yum lnga la/ /byang chub pa ni bdes khyab pa'o/ /rnam par mi 'dra ba yin la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang 'byung gi /ye shes lhan cig skyes rig mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku/ /skye dang las

<p>118b.6</p>chen theg gcig gis 'bras bu/ /bla ma'i dus thabs lta bur gnas/ /nyon mongs khams rnams drug gyur pa/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid shud+d+ha ste/ /gzhan dag nyon mongs spang ba'o/ /rdo rje theg pas rtog pa 'joms/ /nyon zad rtog med ma yin te/ /rtog bral ci yang gnas
<p>118b.7</p>pa med/ /de yis de nyid rnyed pa yis/ /dge sdig rtog pa las kyi khams/ /bde ba chen po zad che ba'o/ /chu bo rnam pa lnga yin te/ /bdag lta'i chu bo rdzas chu bo/ /zhe sdang gti mug chu bo dang / /'dod chags chu yi rgyun phyogs khyer/ /dga' bzhi'i gzings kyis sgrol
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>byed pas/ /rgya mtsho ma lus rgal ba'o/ /de rnams yongs su dag pa yis/ /kun las rgal zhes brjod pa yin/ /sbyor ba thabs dang shes rab la/ /chags bral chags pa mya ngan 'das/ /bde ba tshor ba sred pa 'dzin/ /ngo tsha rtse dang lta rol pa/ /shes rab ma
<p>119a.2</p>yi chos brgyad do/ /chags dang tshim dang dga' ba dang / /gya nom pa dang rtse ba dang / /tsum+ba nyed dang sgra brjod dang / /brtan dang brtson dang yid byed pa/ /bcu gcig thabs kyi byed pa'o/ /de lta'i chos spangs sems can ni/ /ye shes rnyed dka' dgon par 'dod/ /de las byung ba ye
<p>119a.3</p>shes rten/ /de 'dra'i rnam grol lam gyis ni/ /nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs/ /'khrul pa'i khams rnams rtog pa kun/ /bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa/ /de ni thabs chen dug la bsngags/ /brtul ba lta bu yon tan thob/ /sngags med dug gis 'chi

<p>119a.7</p>grol/ /sems can kun gyi 'khor ba'i gnas/ /yid dga' ba ni lam thob pa'o/ /grub mtha' rang rang 'dod pa la/ /'dod pa med pa mthar phyin pa'o/ /'khrul pa med do dam pa'i don/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /ji bzhin pa ni rtog dang bral/ /byis pa

<p>121b.1</p>don gyi rnam pa phyag rgya che/ /rnam dag dpal ni bzhi pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum ni lus phyi nang / /bar gsum yin la skal bzang che/ /dpral ba'i thig le bcu drug go/ /dpal ldan 'byor ba dga' bzhi sogs/ /kun byed pa ni gtum mo'o/ /'jam dpal thig le ldan pa ni/

<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>bya med/ /nyon mongs phrag dog gnyen po ni/ /bya grub ye shes rnam shes brgyad/ /'du byed don grub lus la ni/ /dbang phyug rdo rje sgrib rnams sel/ /sna tshogs bya dga' dus mtha' bskyil/ /ye shes dga' ba dbang rdzogs pa/ /mngon spyod sgrub byed rlung gi khams/ /bde chen sku ste bco

<p>122b.3</p>phyag rgya che ldan khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid ye shes bral/ /sgra blo 'das pa khyod la 'dud/ /de ltar sku lnga bdag nyid can/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la/ /rtag tu 'dud pa rdo rje'i lus/ /khams lnga dag pas sh+lo ka /lnga yi rnam par dag pa'o/ /'dud kyi rgya
